markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spell-Repelling Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=2936) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evolution" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=394" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 72 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your eidolon evolves to protect itself from the danger posed by spells. It gains a +1 status bonus to all saving throws against magic.
name: Spell-Repelling Form
